request_0.formal_statement:
lemma substitute_quadratic:
  fixes k x :: real
  assumes "x = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
  shows "2 * x^2 - 13 * x + k = 0 \<longleftrightarrow> k = 19 / 4"

request_1.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_root_property:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a * x^2 + b * x + c = 0"
  shows "x = (-b ± sqrt(b^2 - 4ac)) / (2a) \<longrightarrow> c = a * x^2 + b * x"

request_2.formal_statement:
lemma sqrt_simplification:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a >= 0" "b >= 0"
  shows "sqrt(a + b) = sqrt a + sqrt b \<longleftrightarrow> a = 0 ∨ b = 0"

request_3.formal_statement:
lemma square_root_algebra:
  fixes a b :: real
  shows "(a - sqrt b)^2 = a^2 - 2*a*sqrt b + b"

request_4.formal_statement:
lemma combine_fractions:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  shows "(a/b) + (c/d) = (ad + bc) / (bd)"

request_5.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_root_property:
  fixes a b c x :: real
  assumes "a ≠ 0"
  shows "a * x^2 + b * x + c = 0 ⟷ x = (-b ± sqrt(b^2 - 4*a*c)) / (2*a)"

request_6.formal_statement:
lemma expand_square:
  fixes a b :: real
  shows "(a - b)^2 = a^2 - 2*a*b + b^2"

request_7.formal_statement:
lemma combine_fractions:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  assumes "c ≠ 0" "d ≠ 0"
  shows "(a/c) + (b/d) = (a*d + b*c) / (c*d)"

request_8.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_root_condition:
  fixes k x :: real
  assumes "x = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
    and "2 * x^2 - 13 * x + k = 0"
  shows "k = 19/4"

request_9.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_formula:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a ≠ 0"
  shows "x = (-b ± sqrt(b^2 - 4ac)) / (2a)"

request_10.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_square_root_expression:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a ≥ 0"
  shows "sqrt(a) * sqrt(b) = sqrt(a * b)"

request_11.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_square_root:
  fixes a b :: real
  shows "sqrt(a^2 + b^2) = sqrt(a^2) + sqrt(b^2) ⟷ a ≥ 0 ∧ b ≥ 0"

request_12.formal_statement:
lemma roots_of_quadratic:
  fixes a b c x :: real
  assumes "a ≠ 0" "x = (-b ± sqrt(b^2 - 4*a*c)) / (2*a)"
  shows "a*x^2 + b*x + c = 0"

request_13.formal_statement:
lemma sqrt_simplification:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a ≥ 0" "b ≥ 0"
  shows "sqrt(a + b) = sqrt a + sqrt b ⟹ a + b = (sqrt a + sqrt b)^2"

request_14.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_square_root:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x ≥ 0" "y ≥ 0"
  shows "sqrt(x * y) = sqrt x * sqrt y"

request_15.formal_statement:
lemma real_number_properties:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x ≥ 0" "y ≥ 0"
  shows "x + y ≥ 0"

request_16.formal_statement:
lemma substitute_x_in_quadratic:
  fixes k x :: real
  assumes h0: "x = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
  shows "2 * x^2 - 13 * x = (19 - 4 * k) / 4"

request_17.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_formula:
  fixes a b c x :: real
  assumes "a ≠ 0"
  shows "a * x^2 + b * x + c = 0 ⟷ x ∈ {(-b - sqrt (b^2 - 4 * a * c)) / (2 * a), (-b + sqrt (b^2 - 4 * a * c)) / (2 * a)}"

request_18.formal_statement:
lemma substitute_and_simplify:
  fixes k x :: real
  assumes "2 * x^2 - 13 * x + k = 0"
  shows "k = 13 * x - 2 * x^2"

request_19.formal_statement:
lemma sqrt_properties:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a ≥ 0" "b ≥ 0"
  shows "sqrt (a * b) = sqrt a * sqrt b"

request_20.formal_statement:
lemma algebraic_simplification:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
  shows "2 * a^2 - 13 * a = -19/4"

request_22.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_quadratic_expression:
  fixes x :: real
  assumes "x = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
  shows "2 * x^2 - 13 * x = -19 / 4"

request_23.formal_statement:
lemma square_equation:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a = b"
  shows "a^2 = b^2"

request_24.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_sqrt:
  fixes k :: real
  assumes "k ≥ 0"
  shows "sqrt(k) * sqrt(k) = k"

request_25.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_square_root:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
  shows "a^2 = (300 - 26 * sqrt 131) / 16"

request_26.formal_statement:
lemma combine_terms:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  assumes "a = b / c" "d = e / f"
  shows "a + d = (b * f + e * c) / (c * f)"

request_27.formal_statement:
lemma calculate_quadratic_term:
  fixes x :: real
  assumes "x = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
  shows "2 * x^2 = (300 - 26 * sqrt 131) / 8"

request_28.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_root_properties:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a > 0"
  shows "x = (-b ± sqrt (b^2 - 4ac)) / (2a) ⟹ a*x^2 + b*x + c = 0"

request_29.formal_statement:
lemma Vieta:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a > 0"
  shows "x1 + x2 = -b/a ∧ x1 * x2 = c/a"

request_30.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_square_root:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a = 13" "b = sqrt 131"
  shows "(2 * (a - b)^2) = (2 * a^2 - 4 * a * b + 2 * b^2)"

request_31.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_square_root_expression:
  fixes x y :: real
  shows "sqrt(x^2) = abs x"

request_32.formal_statement:
lemma solve_for_k:
  fixes k :: real
  assumes "2 * x^2 - 13 * x + k = 0"
  shows "k = 19/4"

request_33.formal_statement:
lemma combine_terms:
  fixes a b c d :: real
  assumes "denom1 > 0" "denom2 > 0"
  shows "a/denom1 + b/denom2 = (a * denom2 + b * denom1) / (denom1 * denom2)"

request_34.formal_statement:
lemma sqrt_diff:
  fixes x y :: real
  assumes "x ≥ 0" "y ≥ 0"
  shows "sqrt(x) - sqrt(y) = (x - y) / (sqrt(x) + sqrt(y))"

request_35.formal_statement:
lemma compute_neg_13x:
  fixes x :: real
  assumes "x = (13 - sqrt 131) / 4"
  shows "-13 * x = - (169 - 13 * sqrt 131) / 4"

request_36.formal_statement:
lemma rearranging_terms:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a = b + c"
  shows "b = a - c"

request_37.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_root_relation:
  fixes a b c :: real
  assumes "a > 0"
  shows "2 * x^2 - 13 * x + k = 0 \<Longrightarrow> k = 13^2/(4*a) - (b^2)/(4*a)"

request_38.formal_statement:
lemma sqrt_fraction:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "b > 0"
  shows "sqrt(a / b) = sqrt(a) / sqrt(b)"

request_39.formal_statement:
lemma sqrt_subtract:
  fixes a b :: real
  assumes "a >= b"
  shows "sqrt a - sqrt b = (a - b) / (sqrt a + sqrt b)"

request_40.formal_statement:
lemma simplify_quadratic:
  fixes x :: real
  shows "2 * x^2 - 13 * x = (300 - 26 * sqrt 131) / 8 - (338 - 26 * sqrt 131) / 8"

request_41.formal_statement:
lemma roots_coefficients:
  fixes a b c r1 r2 :: real
  assumes "a ≠ 0" "r1 + r2 = -b/a" "r1 * r2 = c/a"
  shows "a*x^2 + b*x + c = (x - r1)*(x - r2)"

request_42.formal_statement:
lemma quadratic_formula:
  fixes a b c x :: real
  assumes "a ≠ 0"
  defines "disc ≡ b^2 - 4 * a * c"
  assumes "disc ≥ 0"
  shows "a * x^2 + b * x + c = 0 ⟷ x ∈ {(-b - sqrt disc) / (2*a), (-b + sqrt disc) / (2*a)}"
